message.body: Apple Should Consider Dividend Raise $AAPL $QQQ #dividend #AAPL #profits #IT #revenue #cash #PE #ASP #AI #iPhone #ML https://seekingalpha.com/article/4202285

links.title: Apple Should Consider Dividend Raise
links.description: Back in April, I presented my annual prediction for technology giant Apple ( AAPL) and its expected upcoming dividend raise. While some were calling for a substantial increase given tax cuts and repatriation, I figured that the company would stay the course and favor its share repurchase plan.
